titles.title: A bill to improve the procedures for the authentication and the secure and tamper-evident delivery and transmission of certain court orders.
Digital Authenticity for Court Orders Act of 2021
Digital Authenticity for Court Orders Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Digital Authenticity for Court Orders Act of 2021
This bill generally requires certain court orders, particularly those relating to wiretaps, electronic surveillance, and search and seizures, to have authentic digital signatures.
